content.title: Scenic Aerial Tram
content.description:
Climb over 2,000 feet on the aerial tram. This panoramic 10-minute ride soars above the iconic Tram Face, offering stunning mountain vistas and beautiful views of Lake Tahoe itself, ending at Squaw Valley's High Camp. High Camp is located at 8,200 feet above sea level. Please note that the Aerial Tram is operating at 75% capacity in accordance with state and county guidelines.

For those interested in riding the Aerial Tram outside of the wedding day you may [purchase a discounted ticket here](https://book.squawalpine.com/Ecomm/Package/Package/9801138/en-US/?packageid=61465&promocode=CheMarzejonTT), or you may use your IKON pass to ride for free. No tickets necessary to get to venue on wedding day.

[More Information](https://www.squawalpine.com/?season=summer&utm_source=google&utm_medium=paidsearch&utm_content=aa117643392650-cc522620885162&utm_keyword=squaw+valley+gondola&utm_campaign=SA_Activities-S-ECM-LCL_SEA_B_LW_EXM&gclid=CjwKCAjwgb6IBhAREiwAgMYKRo-xLLwoKCHuabYSBvOCrlBuyyWcNYsuxcZyIopstLcQfNh2Oir4mBoC80cQAvD_BwE&gclsrc=aw.ds)

content.title: Waterfront Activities
content.description:
[Skylandia State Park & Beach](http://www.tahoepublicbeaches.org/skylandia-state-park-beach/)

Lake Forest Rd, Tahoe City, CA 96145

A 24-acre park located 1.5 miles east of Tahoe City on Lake Forest Road. Skylandia Park provides bike trails, hiking trails, and picnicking. The park also features a beach, pier and swimming area.

[Tahoe City Commons Beach](https://www.tahoepublicbeaches.org/beaches/tahoe-city-commons-beach/)

400 North Lake Blvd, Tahoe City, CA 96145

Commons Beach is popular for sunbathing, swimming, and picnicking. Group picnic sites and children's playgrounds are located within a large lakefront grass and sand area.

content.title: Parki Narodowe
content.description:
[Park Narodowy Redwood](https://www.tysiacstronswiata.pl/park-narodowy-redwood/)

To właśnie tu rosną sekwoje wieczniezielone (*Sequoia sempervirens*) które są **najwyższymi drzewami na Ziemi**. Drzewa te osiągają średnio od 60 do 100 m wysokości. Są również takie, które na tym nie poprzestały. I tak właśnie **Hyperion – najwyższe drzewo na świecie** – ma obecnie ponad **115 metrów** i wciąż rośnie.

[Park Narodowy Doliny Śmierci](https://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Park_Narodowy_Doliny_%C5%9Amierci)

Park narodowy położony w hrabstwie Inyo stanu Kalifornia i częściowo w hrabstwie Nye stanu Nevada. Zajmuje powierzchnię 13 628 km², obejmując kamienną pustynię z najniżej położonym miejscem na półkuli zachodniej.

content.title: Golf
content.description:
Enjoy a round of golf surrounded by exquisite views of Squaw Valley when you play at the Resort At Squaw Creek.

Looking to play at other locations around the lake? 

Just ten minutes away, you can tee of at the [Tahoe City Golf Course](https://golftahoecity.com/), which offers great family-friendly options, or at the beautiful [Old Brockway Golf Course](https://www.oldbrockway.com/) in King's Beach that offers a lake view.

descriptions.description:
**Elevation and Altitude Considerations**

Squaw Valley village is located in the Sierra Nevada mountain range with a max elevation of 8,200 ft (2,500 m) above sea level.  It's dry up here, drink lots of water.

Some may experience nausea or lightheaded, symptoms of altitude sickness when the body adjusts the lower air pressure and lower oxygen levels at altitude.

**Find Events and Activities at Squaw Valley**

From Lake Tahoe Beaches, Truckee River Rafting, Biking, Boating, and Hiking. [View all activities](https://www.squawalpine.com/events-and-activities/lake-tahoe) available in the Lake Tahoe area.

[Event Calendar](https://www.squawalpine.com/events-and-activities/events-calendar), [Activities](https://www.squawalpine.com/events-and-activities/activity-finder), [Dining](https://www.squawalpine.com/events-and-activities/dining-and-apres), and [More](https://www.squawalpine.com/events-and-activities)...
